title: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Like Father, Like Son! Adi In Madrasi Avatar To Impress Aliya!
text:
» Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Like Father, Like Son! Adi In Madrasi Avatar To Impress Aliya! Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Like Father, Like Son! Adi In Madrasi Avatar To Impress Aliya! In Yeh Hai Mohabbatein, after Raman’s makeover, Adi too, changes his avatar. Read on to know more…  15   
The makers of Yeh Hai Mohabbatein are leaving no stones unturned to keep the audiences engaged. Recently, we saw Raman's ( Karan Patel ) changed look and now Adi will also replicate the same.. Read on to know more .... Ishita Organises A Function 
In the upcoming episode, the Ishita will be seen organising Shagun's baby shower. It will be a themed function, where all the family members will be seen in different avatars. Men Not Allowed! 
Apparently, the ladies choose a South Indian look. All ladies will be seen wearing beautiful silk saris. But, the men are not allowed, while Adi and Romi want to attend the function. Ishita & Gulabo 
Ishita will be seen in a beautiful Kanchipuram sari. She will even ask Gulabo to help her wear sari! Gulabo tries to find out as to what Ishita feels about Raman! Adi 
Adi plans to enter the house in Madrasi avatar. He will also influence Romi to change to Madrasi avatar. Both Romi and Adi will be seen wearing white shirt and veshti. Adi & Romi In Madrasi Avatar 
They will also don big moustache and goggles, which make them completely unrecognisable. In short, both of them look like ‘gundas'! Adi & Aliya 
Adi enters Aliya's room in Madrasi avatar. He forces her to kiss him. Aliya will be in shock as Adi is unrecognisable. It has to be seen if Aliya recognises Adi in Madrasi avatar. Ruhi 
Ruhi enters Aliya's room and will be shocked to see her with a man who forces upon her! Later, Adi reveals his real identity, which shocks Ruhi. She asks Adi as to what is he doing in the house, as men are not allowed! Gulabo Fights With Goons For Ishita! 
Also, Gulabo and Ishita go to a market, where some goons tease Ishita. Gulabo aka Raman doesn't take it lightly as they are teasing his wife. Gulabo will be seen teaching the goons a lesson, by fighting with them! Story So Far... As we revealed earlier, Raman follows Mani and misses a date with his wife. Ishita gets disappointed as Raman doesn't show up for dinner. Ishita leaves the restaurant thinking of Raman and his betrayal! On the other hand, Adi is upset with Raman and thinks he has always been upsetting Ishita. But Aliya feels that Raman would have had some important work, and that could be why he missed it.. Adi promises Aliya that he will never hurt her like Raman. It has to be recalled that Nidhi has trapped Mani. She takes Mani's help and escapes from the jail. She takes Mani's help and escape from the jail. She makes the police believe that she died in the blast.Mani will be helpless as Aliya's Dadi is in danger. If he doesn't help Nidhi, she would hurt his aunt. So, he dances to Nidhi's tunes! Nidhi also changes her identity to escape from the police. She asks Mani to book the hotel room for her to rest.Ishita finds Mani to be tired and questions him, while he goes to his room giving an excuse. Aliya plans to conduct a puja/function for Shagun so that Mani's mood changes. She also plans to get her dadi home.Will Aliya and Ishita get to know what's bothering Mani?
